article.title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

content.description: A judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data

requirements.description: May only be recognised or enforceable in any manner

conditions.description: If based on an international agreement
conditions.scope: in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State

content.description: Without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter
